experiencesList.title: Postdoctoral Research Scientist
experiencesList.company: Department of Computer Science, University of Copenhagen (DIKU)

experiencesList.title: PhD Fellow
experiencesList.company: Department of Biology, University of Copenhagen (DIKU)
details: PhD fellow position with the Structural Biology and NMR group at the University of Copenhagen. Research focused on protein-drug interactions, drug resistance and development of software solutions for bridging experimental and theoretical analysis of protein ensembles.
Teaching experience as teacher's assistant and lecturer on 2014 and 2015 "Linux and Python Programming" course for bioinformaticians and computer science students.
